package.name: tf3
package.description: tf3 is the second generation of the transform library, which lets the user keep track of multiple coordinate frames over time. tf3 maintains the relationship between coordinate frames in a tree structure buffered in time, and lets the user transform points, vectors, etc between any two coordinate frames at any desired point in time.
package.author: Tully Foote
Eitan Marder-Eppstein
Wim Meeussen
